definitions.text: the quality of being unlike or dissimilar
examples: there are many differences between jazz and rock

definitions.text: a variation that deviates from the standard or norm
a disagreement or argument about something important
examples: he had a dispute with his wife
the familiar conflict between Republicans and Democrats
the difference in her is amazing
his support made a real difference

definitions.text: the number that remains after subtraction; the number that when added to the subtrahend gives the minuend
